project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-Line Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin as specified by the user.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion logic from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion logic from Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic from Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic from Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic from Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic from Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement command-line interface for user input
Write tests for each of the conversion features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
